thread.title: Mayer scrambles as Yahoo misses earnings, revenue
thread.title_full: Mayer scrambles as Yahoo misses earnings, revenue - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Mayer scrambles as Yahoo misses earnings, revenue
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle CEO Marissa Mayer insists that Yahoo continues on the path to a turnaround. CEO Marissa Mayer insists that Yahoo continues on the path to a...
Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer tried to reassure investors on Tuesday that the struggling tech giant is still on a path to success, even as key executives are leaving and the company failed to meet analysts’ expectations. CEO Marissa Mayer insists that Yahoo continues on the path to a turnaround. CEO Marissa Mayer insists that Yahoo continues on the path to a...
Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer tried to reassure investors on Tuesday that the struggling tech giant is still on a path to success, even as key executives are leaving and the company failed to meet analysts’ expectations.
